pullrequest.title: updating head to initial MultiSense SL model, with temporary unsynchronized streams.

content.raw:
I think you're missing a link on the laser - it should be head -> nodding_link -> head_hokuyo
The point of that extra link is that it densifies the laser point cloud even when the robot is standing perfectly stationary.

Question T172 from DARPA: 
How many degrees of freedom does the LIDAR mount have? 	
A. Two ‐a nodding 'yes' motion up and down, and a rotational DOF above the nodding joint about the head's x‐axis (forward facing axis).
